titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to permit producers to plant supplemental and alternative income-producing crops on acreage considered to be planted to a program crop.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 6/10/1988--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949, effective for the 1988 through 1990 crop years, to permit producers to plant specified supplemental and alternative income-producing crops on acreage considered to be planted to program crops.
